Keywords: Detective , X-Factor , X-Men
Real Name: Lorna Dane
Special Powers
HELLFIRE GALA: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, when a friendly character with the X-Men keyword attacks and the attack roll includes exactly one 5, you may replace the other die with a 5.
HIGH FASHION: TRANSLUCENT SILICONE DRESS: When a friendly character with the X-Men keyword hits and a 5-5 was rolled, after resolutions choose a character within range and place that character up to two squares away from the square they currently occupy.
MAGNETIZED: Telekinesis, Telekinesis as FREE. When Polaris uses it, she may instead target an opposing character she hit this turn.
